      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Account.accountExist​(int accNo, Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: setSuspended description: The function is used to judge that whether the account of customer exists.
      void Account.addDeposit​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: addDeposit description: The function is used to offer deposit service for user.
      void Account.addWithdrawal​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: setSuspended description: The function is used to offer withdrawal service for user.
      void Account.clearBalance​(Account newAccount)  
      void Bank_Control.clearFunds​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: clearFunds description: The function is used to clear the un-cleared funds of customer param: newAccount return: String
      void Account.close​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: close description: The function is used to close the account of customer param: newAccount return: String
      void Transaction.findLineNoOfAccNo​(Account newAccount, int accNo)  
      double Account.getBalance​(Account newAccount)  
      double Account.getUnClearedFunds​(Account newAccount)  
      static void Account.inquryBalance​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: inquryBalance description: The function is used to offer balance inquiring service for user.
      void Account.loginAccountSuccess​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: loginAccountSuccess description: The interface when user login the account successfully.
      void Deposit.noticeMessage​(Account newAccount, int accNo)  
      void Withdrawal.noticeMessage​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: noticeMessage description: The operation interface when user withdraw from the account.
      void Bank_Control.printAccountInfo​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: printAccountInfo description: Print 7 pieces of relevant information under the specified account number in the user file param: newAccount return: String
      void Bank_Control.readAccountInfo​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: readAccountInfo description: Read 7 pieces of relevant information under the specified account number in the user file param: newAccount return: String
      void Bank_Control.reinstate​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: reinstate description: The function is used to reinstate the account of customer param: newAccount return: String
      void Bank_Control.setNotice​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: reinstate description: The function is used to set notice when user withdraw from saver account param: newAccount return: String
      void Account.setSuspended​(Account newAccount)
      author: Zejian Li methodsName: setSuspended description: The function is used to suspend the account of customer param: newAccount return: String
